doc - the document in which the position is given
Returns:
offset in the document
Throws:
org.eclipse.jface.text.BadLocationException - if the given position doesn't exist

pos - Position wrapped in an Erlang Tuple: {Line, Column}
doc - the current document
Returns:
offset in the document
Throws:
com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangRangeException - if the tuple is not well formed

getTextSegment

public static java.lang.String getTextSegment(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangTuple start,
                                              com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangTuple end,
                                              org.eclipse.jface.text.IDocument doc)
                                       throws com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangRangeException,
                                              org.eclipse.jface.text.BadLocationException
Returns the selection's text from the active editor's text file.

Parameters:
start - tuple with 2 element: line:int(), col:int()
end - tuple with 2 element: line:int(), col:int()
doc - the document in which the scan is run
Returns:
selected text
Throws:
com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangRangeException - if the position tuple is not well formed
org.eclipse.jface.text.BadLocationException - if the given position does not exist

doc - selected document

org.eclipse.jface.text.BadLocationException - if the positions does not name a corrsssect place
